title: Lorraine viewers cringing after host asks Abbey Clancy if Peter Crouch is sporty

Lorraine viewers were left in shock when the host asked Abbey Clancy if her footballer husband Peter Crouch is "sporty".

Stunning model Abbey, 33, appeared on the ITV show this morning alongside her eight-year-old daughter Sophia.

Lorraine Kelly asked the mother-daughter duo about their new Lipsy line and their beautiful modelling pictures, and quizzed Sophia about whether or not she'd like to follow in her famous mum's footsteps.

But during the segment, Lorraine left viewers perplexed when she asked if Peter, who used to play for Liverpool and has 42 caps for England, is "sporty".

She said: "So is dad quite sporty? Does he take the kids out running and playing football?"

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: Getty Images)

Immediately fans took to Twitter about the veteran presenter's question.

One said: "Is dad sporty? He's played football for every club in the football league."

Another said: "Is Peter Crouch quite sporty? Oh no."

A third commented: "Did #Lorraine just ask if Peter Crouch is 'quite sporty'?"

However, Abbey's answer suggested that Lorraine's question was justified after all.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

She said: "You'd think so, wouldn't you, Lorraine? But no, he doesn't.

"It's funny because Pete's obviously a professional athlete and he's very, very determined when it comes to his job, and I'm not competitive at all, but when we go to watch Sophia, he says to her 'Sophia, it's okay, just enjoy it', and I'm like, 'Focus!'"

Lorraine also couldn't believe the mum-of-four's confession that she doesn't enjoy football.

Abbey said: "I am a terrible WAG."

Yesterday Abbey and Sophia launched the new Lipsy line with Sophia modelling the new kids' clothing range.

(Image: Lipsy / PR Handout)

(Image: Getty Images Europe)

The pair were seen holding hands in sweet snaps taken inside a stunning stately home.

One of the shots shows the mum and daughter wearing very similar black dresses, while another features them in almost matching feathered frocks.

Abbey and Peter are also parents to Liberty, four, Johnny, 20 months, and baby Jack, who was born in June.
